text: It's a Bare, Bare World! is a 1963 British naturist film.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 p 48-49 ==References== ==External links== *It's a Bare, Bare World! at IMDb Category:British films Category:1963 films
title: It's a Bare, Bare World!
